ComicInfo.Summary:
The Druidic Doom: An ancient feud over the ownership of a castle brings the Chancton Creature to life.
The Return of Astro: A rivalry between two wizards is revived in the present day by their descendants.
Pawn of the Giant Grapplers: Ed Newcomb finds an alien criminal and challenges him to an arm-wrestling match for the fate of the Earth.
ComicInfo.Title: The Druidic Doom; The Return of Astro; Pawn of the Giant Grapplers
